Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to retirement benefits for certain employees
Summary: Relates to the election of retirement benefits for certain members of the New York state and local employees' retirement system who are employed by the office of mental health.
LawCode: Amd ยง700, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to retirement benefits for certain employees; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
